data.text:
Players receive wrong number of tiles at game start.

**CRITICAL:** Players should only receive 6 tiles each. The remaining tiles form the "boneyard".

**Current behavior:** Players may be receiving more tiles than allowed
**Expected:** 
- Each player gets exactly 6 tiles
- Remaining tiles displayed on the side, face-down (backs visible, no one can see values)
- Boneyard is for dramatic effect only - tiles are inaccessible during standard play

**Implementation:**
- Backend: Limit distribution to 6 tiles per player
- Frontend: Show boneyard pile on side with face-down tiles for atmosphere
